DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize control trial evaluate feasibility introduce innovative eHealth technology , Embodied Conversational Agent ( ECA ) , diverse woman urban outpatient setting .
DOC.brief_title: Engaging Women With Gabby System Deliver Multiple Health-Related Behavioral Changes : A Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: This trial focus use embody conversational agent ( ECA ) name Gabby teach healthy lifestyle behavior ( healthy eating , exercise , stress reduction ) . This feasibility randomize control trial include 70 woman outpatient setting ( 35 intervention 35 control ) . The control group receive usual care ( patient information sheet healthy eating , exercise , stress reduction CD meditation , body scan , mindful yoga ) . The ECA animate conversational character simulate face-to-face interaction patient . During intervention , ECA talk use synthetic speech synchronize animation ; patient `` talk '' click want say use computer 's mouse . The ECA delivers information experiential stress ( principle mindfulness base stress reduction : meditation , yoga , body scan ) , nutrition , exercise . If participant randomize intervention , research assistant ( RA ) teach subject use ECA workstation . The ECA review patient nutrition , stress , exercise , use ECA workstation also program subject 's baseline information ( e.g. , name , age ) . Subjects ask log onto system day interact system long wish . Prior midpoint survey , participant receive reminder phone call/email . At 14 day , RA survey participant regard satisfaction either ECA paper handout , whether adhere lifestyle modification recommendation . This conduct either email , phone person . Prior end 30 day study participation , RA call email schedule visit complete post intervention questionnaire . The RA call/email 1-2 day final study visit remind participant . The RA conduct post intervention interview person phone . All participant receive compensation completion survey . Control Group : The control subject receive usual care ( patient information sheet stress , nutrition exercise CD ) . The RA administer baseline , mid-point final survey control participant . The investigator know , however , whether health information technology use effectively deliver information exercise , nutrition stress outpatient set . This study add new information viability use ECA woman outpatient set compare patient information sheet .
DOC.criteria: English fluency sufficient follow treatment instruction answer survey question Access telephone ( landline , cellular phone ) Access computer/laptop internet/WiFi access Known plan pregnancy Mental health substance abuse problem would bar completion study Refusal consent
